name: ai-tab-saver-extension
description: Chrome extension build files for AI Tab Saver

scripts.build: echo 'Extension files are ready for Chrome'
scripts.zip: zip -r ai-tab-saver-extension.zip manifest.json popup.html popup.css popup.js icons/ README-Extension.md
scripts.install: echo 'Load the extension folder in Chrome at chrome://extensions/'

author: AI Tab Saver Team
